data.scheme_name: State Credit Linked Interest Subsidy for Technology Up-gradation scheme (SCLISS)
data.benefits: Scheme provides interest subsidy on term loan to finance technology up-gradation up to a maximum of Rs 10 Lakh per year for 3 years.
data.eligibility: All the existing Micro and Small Units located anywhere in the State are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The unit must upgrade its plant and machinery with state-of-the-art technology as per CLCSS guidelines of GoI.
Industries graduating from small to medium scale due to additional loan under CLCSS are eligible, with a certificate from SIDBI or NABARD.
The item of manufacture must not be on the restrictive list as notified by the State Government.
Technology upgrades must involve new, clean, green, and energy-efficient technologies.
The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable.
The unit should be in commercial production and in regular production at the time of disbursement.
Units that applied for CLCSS but didn’t receive the subsidy due to revisions are eligible under the State Credit Linked Interest Subsidy Scheme, if all terms are met.
Replacing existing equipment/technology with the same or second-hand machinery does not qualify for subsidy.
The subsidy is not applicable to foreign currency loans, multiple loans, or transferred loans.
data.beneficiaries: All the existing Micro and Small Units located anywhere in the State are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The unit must upgrade its plant and machinery with state-of-the-art technology as per CLCSS guidelines of GoI.
Industries graduating from small to medium scale due to additional loan under CLCSS are eligible, with a certificate from SIDBI or NABARD.
The item of manufacture must not be on the restrictive list as notified by the State Government.
Technology upgrades must involve new, clean, green, and energy-efficient technologies.
The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable.
The unit should be in commercial production and in regular production at the time of disbursement.
Units that applied for CLCSS but didn’t receive the subsidy due to revisions are eligible under the State Credit Linked Interest Subsidy Scheme, if all terms are met.
Replacing existing equipment/technology with the same or second-hand machinery does not qualify for subsidy.
The subsidy is not applicable to foreign currency loans, multiple loans, or transferred loans.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: The survival and growth of enterprises is critically dependent on their modernization and technological upgradation. The up-gradation of both the process of manufacturing and plant & machinery is necessary for small enterprises to reduce the cost of production and remain price competitive at a time when cheaper products are easily available in the global market.
data.objective: The objective of Credit Linked Interest Subsidy Scheme for Technology Up- gradation is to improve the access to finance for enterprises investing in modernization and technology up-gradation.
data.description:
Scheme provides interest subsidy on term loan to finance technology up-gradation:
A and B category blocks : 5% 
C and D category blocks :  6%

Maximum cap of upto Rs.10 lakhs per year for a period of 3 years.
data.how_to_apply:
Application on prescribed Form (Annexure-I) for the grant of State Credit Linked Interest Subsidy (SCLISS) along with listed documents would be submitted to the Director/ Director General, MSME, Haryana on the web portal of the department.
Annexure-I: https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2022/06/2022060240.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
